1991.definition: Involuntary commitment (inpatient) is prohibitive for firearm purchase/possession
Recent treatment for alcohol-related reasons is prohibitive for firearm purchase/possession
Firearm purchase/possession is prohibited for some people with alcoholism
State dealer license required for sale of all firearms
State dealer license required for handgun sales
Record keeping and retention required for all private sellers and all licensed dealers for all firearms
Record keeping and retention required for all sellers and all dealers for handgun sales
Record keeping and retention required for licensed dealers for all firearm sales
Record keeping and retention required for licensed dealers for handgun sales
At least one store security precaution required
Mandatory police inspections
A license or permit is required to purchase all firearms
A license or permit is required to purchase handguns
Safety training or testing required prior to issuing a firearm license or permit
Permit process involves law enforcement
Purchase of handguns from licensed dealers and private sellers restricted to age 21 and older
Purchase of long guns from licensed dealers and private sellers restricted to age 18 and older
No possession of handguns until age 21
Ammunition sales not allowed to persons under age 18 for any type of ammunition (all firearms)
Ammunition sales not allowed to persons under age 21 for handguns
Universal background checks required at point of transfer for all firearms
Universal background check required at point of transfer for handguns
Background checks required for all gun show firearm sales at point of purchase
Background checks required for purchase of handguns at gun shows at point of purchase
Background checks conducted through permit requirement for all firearm sales (or universal background checks)
Background checks conducted through permit requirement for all handgun sales (or universal background checks)
Background checks for gun sales or permits have more than a three-day limit in which they must be completed
State conducts separate background checks, beyond the federal NICS check, for all firearms
State conducts separate background checks, beyond the federal NICS check, for handguns
Waiting period is required on all firearm purchases from dealers
Waiting period is required on all handgun purchases from dealers
Permit required to carry concealed weapons
"May issue" state
Applicants are required to make a heightened showing to obtain a concealed carry permit
No stand your ground law
No law provides blanket immunity to gun manufacturers or prohibits state or local lawsuits against gun manufacturers
State law does not preempt local regulation of firearms
